Title: 15 things to know about Cape Verde
Summary: Cape Verde qualify for the 2026 World Cup after beating Eswatini 2-0 on Monday . The West African nation is a small island nation in West Africa . The island nation is prominent in the footballing world .

Title: Beware of fake social accounts impersonating me, NRC MD warns public
Summary: Kayode Opeifa has disclaimed several unauthorised social media accounts impersonating him . The Managing Director of the Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC) has warned the public against engaging with fraudulent profiles . He said he had become aware of multiple fake accounts operating under his name .

Title: Nestlé Nigeria opens 2025 Media Awards submissions, adds new category
Summary: Nestlé Nigeria has invited entries for the 2025 Nestlé Media Awards . The Awards recognise journalism that addresses issues of societal importance across the country . For its latest edition, the Awards introduce a Business and Economy Reporting category .

Title: NASS proposes optional use of PVCs, more identification options for elections
Summary: Members of the National Assembly are proposing an amendment to the Electoral Act that would make the use of the Permanent Voter Card (PVC) optional for voters during elections . The proposal, contained in a draft of amendments under consideration, seeks more identification options for elections .

Title: Zamfara APC condemns state govt’s mass sacking of civil servants
Summary: Zamfara State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) condemns state govt’s mass sacking of civil servants . PDP administration led by Governor Dauda Lawal sacked civil servants of the State .

Title: PDP lawmakers want judges cautioned over interference in party affairs
Summary: PDP lawmakers want judges cautioned over interference in party affairs . He added that the court went ahead to make orders which negate the benefits of his ruling .

Title: Why I left PDP – Peter Mbah
Summary: Mbah left the PDP alongside his immediate predecessor, Chief Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi, State and Federal lawmakers, among others .

Title: Lewandowski set to miss Clasico with hamstring injury
Summary: Lewandowski set to miss Clasico with hamstring injury . The 37-year-old forward suffered the injury during a World Cup qualifier for Poland against Lithuania on Sunday .

Title: Photos: Labour Party’s internal crisis reignites as Abure attends INEC meeting
Summary: A picture of the duo attending the meeting was circulated by the faction’s National Publicity Secretary, Obiora Ifoh, in Abuja, on Tuesday .

Title: Broom sellers make brisk sales as Gov Mbah, others join APC in Enugu
Summary: Some of Mbah’s supporters said they were buying the brooms in solidarity with the governor . They said Mbah had done several projects within two years of his administration .
